writeFile

public final java.io.File writeFile(java.lang.String relativePath,
                                    java.lang.String contents)
                             throws java.io.IOException
Overwrites a text file with the UTF-8 encoding of a String.

Parameters:
relativePath - path to the file to overwrite, relative to the temporary directory for this test case. Paths containing '.' or '..' may have surprising results and should be avoided.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
